experiment_design_description: Ten surfaces (door handles into and out of the restroom, handles into and out of a restroom stall, faucet handles, soap dispenser, toilet seat, toilet flush handle, floor around the toilet and floor around the sink) in six male and six female restrooms evenly distributed across two buildings on the University of Colorado at Boulder campus were sampled on a single day in November 2010.
experiment_title: Microbial biogeography of public restroom surfaces
library_construction_protocol: 454 Titanium pyrosequencing of DNA to amplify the V2 region of bacterial 16S rRNA using 23F/338R primers

title: Microbial biogeography of public restroom surfaces

experiment_design_description: Ten surfaces (door handles into and out of the restroom, handles into and out of a restroom stall, faucet handles, soap dispenser, toilet seat, toilet flush handle, floor around the toilet and floor around the sink) in six male and six female restrooms evenly distributed across two buildings on the University of Colorado at Boulder campus were sampled on a single day in November 2010.
experiment_title: Microbial biogeography of public restroom surfaces
library_construction_protocol: 454 Titanium pyrosequencing of DNA to amplify the V2 region of bacterial 16S rRNA using 23F/338R primers
title: Microbial biogeography of public restroom surfaces
